value:
/*
 * Library: IMMZD2DTHepatitisB3OnTime (IMMZ.D2.DT.Hepatitis B.3 doses)
 * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination according to the national immunization schedule
 * Decision Table: 3-dose schedule (birth dose + 2 primary series doses), on-time start
 * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any
 */

def.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1

"No hepatitis B primary series doses were administered"
"Client's age is less than {Member States defined lower limit}"

Client's age is less than {Member States defined lower limit}

def.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Guidance

value: "Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Guidance"
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1"

'Should not vaccinate client for first Hepatitis B dose as client\'s age is not within appropriate age range. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client for second hepatitis B dose as the latest Hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client for third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low birth weight infant and the latest hepatitis B vaccine was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 4"

'Should not vaccinate client for third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low birth weight infant and the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for first Hepatitis B dose as client's age is not within appropriate age range. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for second hepatitis B dose as the latest Hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low birth weight infant and the latest hepatitis B vaccine was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 4

then.value: Should not vaccinate client for third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low birth weight infant and the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

def.name: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Guidance

value: "Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Guidance"
"Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Case 1"
'Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete for client whose weight at birth was over 2000g and who was not premature infant. Two hepatitis B primary series doses were administered.'
"Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Case 2"

'The Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete for client whose weight at birth was below 2000g and who was a premature infant. Four hepatitis B primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
